name: HomegearI2c::write
shortDescription: Writes data to an I²C device.
description: This method writes data to an I²C device previously opened with HomegearI2c::open().

parameters.name: handle
parameters.description: The file pointer resource returned by HomegearI2c::open()

parameters.name: dataIsBinary
parameters.description: Data is in raw binary format instead of hexadecimal string
